ValidationRule.description: Disables the Stable Value Funds field after it's set.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
OR( AND(NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Stable_Value_Funds__c))), ISCHANGED( Stable_Value_Funds__c ), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Stable_Value_Funds__c))))),
AND(ISCHANGED(Stable_Value_Funds__c), ISBLANK( Stable_Value_Funds_Rep_Lookup__c )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change this value after it's set, and need to fill in the Stable Value Funds Rep Lookup field.
